name: Purification: A Serious Game of Environmental Issues
name_original: Purification: A Serious Game of Environmental Issues
description:
"Purification: A Serious Game of Environmental Issues" is my Final Year Project. This is a 2D platform serious game that is using self-design game assets, story, and animation. You may experience a different journey of exploring what's happening in the game, and different NPCs to interact with to get hints and storytelling. 

Kindly fill in the testing form to give me some feedback! Thank you!

Testing Form Link: 

The Purification game story takes place in a country that needs light to survive, but its inhabitants ignore the environmental issues' impact on economic development. As the darkness fall, the bright flora and fauna face death and exhaustion. The main character- Alice starts the journey of redemption and tries to bring back the light to the world. Alice does not know how the darkness came, and she will find out by completing the quests on the journey. What challenges will she face along the way? None of us will know.
